title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.2 - Daily time record required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.2 - Daily time record required

State Regulations
(a) The Industrial Commissioner has prescribed and made part of these regulations
the form of the daily time record required to be kept. A sample copy of such
form may be obtained by addressing the Industrial Commissioner at the State

Office Building, in either Albany or New York City. (b) Any other form of daily time record may
be used, however, provided that the information contained therein conforms to
the information required in the form prescribed by the Industrial

Commissioner. (c) The form
obtainable from the Industrial Commissioner is a sample. It shall be the
responsibility of the employer to furnish forms at his own expense for the use
of drivers. (d) The size of such
form shall be approximately five and one-quarter inches by seven and one-half
inches. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
175.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
